example.name: all args
example.text: He-1 managed *-1 to offload a superb pass to his brother.

example.name: only cargo
example.text: [More than ten tuna ships]-1 come in every day *-1 to offload their catch and to resupply.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'offload' based on sentences in ectb2. Verbnet class spray-9.7-2; no other framed members. Comparison to 'unload'.
